stk.calculators.ga.exiters module¶

Defines Exiter classes.

Exiter objects check to see if an exit condition for the GA has been fulfilled.

Extending stk: Making new exiters.¶

A new Exiter class should inherit Exiter and define an exit() method, which takes progress population as its only argument and returns True or False depending on if an exit condition has been satisfied. The progress population is a Population instance which holds each GA generation as a subpopulation.

class stk.calculators.ga.exiters.AllExiters(*exiters)¶

Bases: stk.calculators.ga.exiters.Exiter

Checks if all Exiter objects return True.

exiters¶

Exiter objects which are checked to see if their exit conditions have been satisfied.

Type:tuple of Exiter
__init__(*exiters)¶

Initializes a AllExiter instance.

Parameters:*exiters (Exiter) – Exiter objects which are checked to see if their exit conditions have been satisfied.
exit(progress)¶

Checks to see if all exit conditions have been satisfied.

Parameters:progress (Population) – A population where every generation is a subpopulation.
Returns:True if all Exiter objects in exiters have satisfied its exit condition.
Return type:bool

class stk.calculators.ga.exiters.Exiter¶

Bases: object

Checks if the exit criterion for the GA has been satisfied.

__init__¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

exit(progress)¶

Checks to see the the GA should stop.

Parameters:progress (Population) – A population where every generation is a subpopulation.
Returns:True if the GA should stop and False otherwise.

class stk.calculators.ga.exiters.FitnessPlateau(num_generations, top_members=1)¶

Bases: stk.calculators.ga.exiters.Exiter

Checks if the fittest molecules remain the same.

num_generations¶

Number of generations in which the fittest molecules did not change.

Type:int
top_members¶

The number of fittest molecules which are checked. This number needs to be smaller than the population size.

Type:int
__init__(num_generations, top_members=1)¶

Initializes a FitnessPlateau instance.

Parameters:
  • num_generations (int) – Number of generations in which the fittest molecules did not change.
  • top_members (int, optional) – The number of fittest molecules which are checked. This number needs to be smaller than the population size.
exit(progress)¶

Checks if the fittest molecules changed between generations.

Parameters:progress (Population) – A population where every generation is a subpopulation.
Returns:True if the top_members have not changed over the last num_gens generations.
Return type:bool
class stk.calculators.ga.exiters.MolPresent(mol)¶

Bases: stk.calculators.ga.exiters.Exiter

Stops the GA if a specific molecule has been found.

mol¶

A molecule which if present in any of the GA’s generations causes it to stop running.

Type:Molecule
__init__(mol)¶

Initializes a MolPresent instance.

Parameters:mol (Molecule) – A molecule which if present in any of the GA’s generations causes it to stop running.
exit(progress)¶

True if mol is in progress.

Parameters:progress (Population) – A population where every generation is a subpopulation.
Returns:True if mol in progress, False otherwise.
Return type:bool

Type:int

Initializes a NumGenerations instance.

Parameters:num_generations (int) – The number of generations after which the GA should stop.

Checks if a number of generations has passed.

Parameters:progress (Population) – A population where every generation is a subpopulation.
Returns:
Return type:True if num_generations or more has passed.
